data.title: Lost Hearts Database
data.text:
The list below is updated regularly as we receive notifications of lost hearts and medals. This list allows us to identify those Hearts to look out for in our future searches. Also, as these medals turn up and someone attempts to research the veteran, a search of their name will appear on our site, alerting the owner that their is a family actively looking for the medal.

Please view the list below, or, if youâ€™d like to have your lost heart appear on this list, fill out our lost heart form here.

To quickly search for a name, use Ctrl+F on Windows (or Command+F on a Mac) to search the list.
